text: The seventh season of The Voice Kids of Vietnam- Giọng hát Việt nhí began on 20 July 2019 on VTV3. All three duo coaches and the main host did not return, leaving the panel to be entirely renewed this season. On June 12, 2019, it was announced that former host and The Voice season 4 Ali Hoàng Dương would return, this time as a coach alongside former music executive Lưu Thiên Hương as a new duo coach; whereas former coach Dương Khắc Linh would return with singer Phạm Quỳnh Anh. Musician Dương Cầm & 2018 Miss International Queen Hương Giang joined the show as a new duo coach, while actresses Gil Lê and Khả Ngân also debuted as hosts. Last season's coach, Hồ Hoài Anh, once again became the show's music executive. ==Teams== ;Color key {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:100%;" |+ |- ! scope="col" style="width:15%;"| Coaches ! style="font-size:90%; line-height:12px;" colspan="6" | |} ==Blind auditions== Filming for the blind auditions began on June 12, 2019. The team sizes were trimmed down to 12 per team. Each coach has the length of the contestant's performance to choose them for their team. If more than two coaches want the same contestant, the contestant will choose which team they want to join. The blind auditions end when all teams are full. The "Block" twist returned for the second time, this season the number of available block is raised to two for each coach in entire blind audition and when the blocked coach press his/her button to turn, the chair doesn't turn around. In a new twist, contestants can "protect" the blocked coach and still pick that team, but the blocked coach would fall into The Frozen state in the next performance and would not be able to press the button in that performance. Each coach has only one "Breaking The Block" per audition. ;Color key {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 90%; white-space: nowrap;" |- | style="background:white; border:1px solid black;"| 18px | Coach hit his or her "TÔI CHỌN BẠN" (I WANT YOU) button |- | style="background:orange; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist defaulted to a coach's team |- | style="background:#fdfc8f; border:1px solid black;"| | style="padding- right: 8px" | Artist elected a coach's team |- | style="background:lightgrey; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist was eliminated with no coach pressing their button |- | style="background:white; border:1px solid black;"| 18px | Coach gained the "Breaking the Block" |- | style="background:darkgrey; border:1px solid black;"| | Coach fall into the Frozen state |- |style="background:hotpink; border:1px solid black;"| 16px | Coach pressed the "I WANT YOU" button, but was blocked by Dương Cầm & Hương Giang from getting the artist |- |style="background:#ccf; border:1px solid black;"| 16px | Coach pressed the "I WANT YOU" button, but was blocked by Ali & Lưu Thiên Hương from getting the artist |- |style="background:#02ff02; border:1px solid black;"| 16px | Coach pressed the "I WANT YOU" button, but was blocked by Khắc Linh & Quỳnh Anh from getting the artist |- |} ===Episode 1 (20 July)=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:100%;" |- ! scope="row" | 11 | Kiều Minh Tâm | 11 | Hanoi | "Bác Hồ một tình yêu bao la" by Thu Hiền | | style="background:orange;text-align:center;"|18px | |- |} ==The Battles== The Battle Round was taped on July 19, 2019, following the same matching rules as applied in previous seasons. Season seven's advisors include: musician Bảo Lan for team Dương Cầm & Hương Giang, former coach of the adult version Tóc Tiên for team Ali Hoàng Dương & Lưu Thiên Hương, and last season's coach Soobin Hoàng Sơn for team Dương Khắc Linh & Phạm Quỳnh Anh. This season, the coaches can "steal" two losing artists from another team as well as save one losing artist from their own team. Contestants who won their battles or saved by the coaches would advance to the Knockouts. color:#b0e6b0;" |'''''' |- |} ==The Knockouts/ The Cross Battles== The new Knockout round took place on September 7 and lasted until the following week. For the first time in the history of The Voice Kids, the cross-battle was applied which featured battles between contestants from different teams. This round's rules was adopted from the fifth season of the adult version. Each turn, three duo coaches would send one of their team member to a cross battle, and only one contestant with the highest point accummulated from the audience's vote as well as vote from a 10-person professional jury would advance to the next round. Each member of the panel can only vote for one contestant from the trio. At the end of the round, each coaches could save one of their losing artists, whereas one eliminated artist who had the highest point would also receive the jury's vote and advance to the next round. This new rule resulted in the uneven number of contestants between teams going into the Playoffs. 5 October)=== This year, after the conclusion of a team, each coach had to eliminate one contestant from their teams. At the end of the round, a contestant who receive the lowest vote from the audience would also be eliminated, leaving 9 artists advancing to the next round. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:100%;" |- ! At the end of the night, each team had to eliminate one contestant, leaving 6 artists advanced to next week's Semi-final. A Wildcard vote was conducted to save two contestants who was eliminated from this stage of the competition to the Live Finale. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:100%;" |- ! style="width:10%;" | Episode ! At the end of the night, one contestant from each team would advance to the finals based on coaches' choices. The result of the Wildcard was announced on October 21, revealing the last two finalists. The recipients of the Wildcards are Nguyễn Đỗ Khánh An and Nguyễn Ngọc Bảo Hân. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:100%;" |- ! style="width:10%;" | Episode ! style="width:23%;" | Coach ! style="width:04%;" | Order ! style="width:20%;" | Artist ! style="width:33%;" | Song ! style="width:10%;" | Result |- ! rowspan="6" scope="row" | Episode 14 | Dương Cầm & Hương Giang | 1 | style="background:;"| Nguyễn Đoàn Chấn Quốc | style="background:;"| "Bão đêm" by Microwave Band | style="background:#b0e0e6;"| Saved by coach |- | rowspan="2" |Ali Hoàng Dương & Lưu Thiên Hương | 2 | style="background:#00fa9a;"| Nguyễn Đỗ Khánh An | style="background:#00fa9a;"| "Nhiều người ôm giấc mơ" by Lê Cát Trọng Lý | style="background:#00fa9a;"| Finals Wildcard |- | 3 | style="background:;"| Kiều Minh Tâm | style="background:;"| "Ngọn lửa cao nguyên" by Siu Black | style="background:#b0e0e6;"| Saved by coach |- | Dương Khắc Linh & Phạm Quỳnh Anh | 4 | style="background:;"| Vũ Linh Đan | style="background:;"| "Về với đông" by Hồng Nhung | style="background:#b0e0e6;"| Saved by coach |- | Dương Cầm & Hương Giang | 5 | style="background:#00fa9a;"| Nguyễn Ngọc Bảo Hân | style="background:#00fa9a;"| "Anh đang ở đâu đấy anh" by Hương Giang | style="background:#00fa9a;"| Finals Wildcard |- | Dương Khắc Linh & Phạm Quỳnh Anh | 6 | style="background:pink;"| Ngô Minh Hằng | style="background:pink;"| "DIVA" by Thu Minh | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |+ Non-competition performances |- ! Huỳnh Phạm Thanh Tâm | style="background:#FF91A4;" | Eliminated |- |} ==Controversies== Throughout the airing time of the season, there have been many accusations that the show's result has been fixed in favor of a team over the other two. During the Cross Battles, controversy arose when a contestant received the highest vote from the professional jury, creating a big difference with the other two contestants but was eliminated because of the audience's vote. After the show aired, many viewers expressed their frustration, saying that the producers deliberately arranged the results in order to send through a contestant from Lưu Thiên Hương's team because she has close relationship with the producers and the music director. The public also criticised the justice of the "audience vote", questioning whether audiences in the studio actually voted. However, producers of The Voice Kids did not give a response. During the Live Finale which aired on October 26, 2019, upon announcing the final results, host Nguyên Khang mistakenly named the first runner-up, Nguyễn Đoàn Chấn Quốc (team Dương Cầm & Hương Giang) as the winner. A few moments later, Nguyên Khang announced that he had read the results incorrectly and that Kiều Minh Tâm (team Ali Hoàng Dương & Lưu Thiên Hương) was the actual winner. This once again arose accusation that the final result was fixed in favor of Lưu Thiên Hương's contestant, whereas the majority of viewers criticised the show of making a joke out of children's feelings. Nguyên Khang however did publicly apologize Chấn Quốc and his family about his mistake. On October 27, a day after the finale, when asked about the incident during the crown moment, Lưu Thiên Hương commented that she thought it was a "small accident" and considered it "memorable" for helping build up bravery for contestants. Her comment immediately received mixed reactions from artists alike as well as the public, with singer Dương Triệu Vũ, supermodel Xuân Lan and Lê Thúy all expressed their frustrations via social media. ==Contestants who appeared on previous shows or seasons== * Lương Trương Quỳnh Anh appeared on the show's last season but didn't turn a chair. * Trần Thị Vân Anh auditioned for the show's fifth season but failed to make a team. * Nguyễn Đỗ Khánh An was the winner of Bolero Idol Kids in 2018. ==References== Category:2010s Vietnamese television series 1
